Class ToAcceptGPS

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, javax.microedition.location.LocationListener
public class ToAcceptGPS
extends java.lang.Thread
implements javax.microedition.location.LocationListener

is used to let the use accept using gps data at the start of the application.
